title: A Cosmic christmas
creator_credit: Learning Corporation of America, Nelvana, Patrick Loubert, Michael Hirsh and Clive A Smith
brief_description: An animated film in which a small town rediscovers the real spirit of Christmas thanks to three alien visitors from outer space and a little boy named Peter. Suitable for lower and middle primary level.
creator_credit_for_label: Learning Corporation of America, Nelvana, Patrick Loubert, Michael Hirsh and Clive A Smith
